lead_paragraph: The airline industry opposes the administration’s plan to curb airplane emissions, saying it could endanger passengers and hurt American companies.

headline.print_headline: E.P.A. Moves to Regulate Emissions in Air Travel
headline.main: Next Item on Obama’s Climate Agenda: Airplane Pollution

snippet: The airline industry opposes the administration’s plan to curb airplane emissions, saying it could endanger passengers and hurt American companies....
abstract: Obama administration announces plans to regulate airline emissions in effort to control release of damaging global warming pollutants; plan, released by EPA, triggers strong opposition from major airlines, which argue proposal could endanger passengers and hurt American companies.
